file_content.text: Tenebrae! Join me in death.
Dramath pierced my armor at the cost of his life. And soon, you will follow him into oblivion...
Rise, my children.
Yes, Father.
We are yours to command.
Vaylin, Arcann... You're free.
Walk free.
How about we make things interesting?
I have a better idea.
I will break Valkorion's leash--and you will help me destroy him.
You are mine to command.
That felt lovely.
Enough. Vanquish the Outlander.
The Outlander freed us. We have other priorities...
Theron!
Go. Save yourself. I'll cover you.
We fight together. We die together.
Now you're talking.
Would you truly side with the Outlander who killed you--and your mother?
The Outlander didn't kill us. You did.
Help Father's puppet if you want, brother. I'm not so forgiving.
You killed Mother without me. Thanks to you, I'll never get to crush the life from her frail body.
Valkorion's manipulating you. The second I'm out of the picture, he'll cage you again--and this time, he'll throw away the key.
This isn't about your mother.
Ignore this nonsense.
No. The Outlander's right.
With her last words, your mother begged Valkorion to destroy us both. Do you really want to fulfill her dying wish?
[Lie] Senya wanted us dead.
The thought makes me sick.
The Outlander lies to you, Vaylin.
And how many times have you lied to me?
Your mother died knowing she failed her empire--and her family.
Don't worry. Senya suffered.
Did she scream?
Endlessly.
You're fun.
The tables have turned.
You have won over my children. Now you will all be consumed by eternity.
Rise, my child.
I am yours to command, Father.
Vaylin... You're free.
Walk free.
That felt lovely.
Enough. Vanquish the Outlander.
The Outlander's toy set me free...
Take the holocron, Arcann. The Outlander needs you.
Father is too strong.
You've proven yourself stronger. Show him the man you've become.
Arcann?
I won't let you face him alone.
Touching.
Vaylin. Strike down the brother who betrayed you--and the Outlander who stole your life away.
Father makes a good point, for once.
Attack us, and forever be Valkorion's slave. Join us, and fight for the freedom he stole from you as a child. It's your choice.
The choice is yours.
Choice. I could get used to that...
She's your sister. Make her listen to reason.
Win her over, Arcann.
Vaylin. Remember when we were children...
I won't be caged. Not again. Not ever.
When I'm done with you, not even dear old dad will recognize what's left.
Fight me and die.
We're so much alike. I should've appreciated that while I was alive.
Such a waste.
Now I see why you locked me away, Father. You knew I'd surpass you. You were afraid.
You have won over my children. Now you will all be consumed by eternity.
Aaagh!
Playing with Thexan. Sparring in the shadow of the Eternal Fleet. Running away and living in the swamps for a month.
All that freedom, stolen when Father locked you in Nathema. He will cage you again--unless you join us.
I'm going to enjoy watching you squirm.
I'm going to enjoy watching you squirm, Father.
I'm going to enjoy watching you squirm, Father.
I have a better idea, Father. The Outlander's toy set me free...
